title: The Chinese Bandit
description: Jake Dodds - a wartime hero and a peacetime bum. Fighter, thief, black marketeer, courageous leader, quiet dreamer...and a lyrical lover of women. Across China's most merciless land, aswarm with warlords, cut-throats, Japanese deserters, whores and nomads...Jake Dodds is running for his life!
author: Stephen Becker
